Name: Franklin Jonathan
description:
Franklin is 23 years of age, studied until the ninth grade at school, and is single.

Franklin engages in agriculture. He plants basic grains on a plot of land that is 5 kilometers from his house, and he gets there by walking. He is also a bricklayer.

He will use this loan to pay manual labor for upkeep and maintenance of the farmland on which he grows his crops.

Franklin hopes to obtain good harvests and to sell them at a very good price.
